short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Assistive reading, easy highlighting and single click notes to clipboard & Reado Notepad

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fond of reading long articles or browsing through the web, Reado assists you everywhere.

Reado assists readers by gently highlighting the hovering sentence and provides easy & smart sentence highlighting. It can generate notes with a single click which can be pasted anywhere and sent to the user's on-the-go Notepad.
